laptops.description: 14 inch Touchscreen FHD 1920 x 1080 4-way NanoEdge display featuring ultra-narrow bezels (5 mm thin) around each side of the display that allows for a 14 inch screen to fit in the body of a 13 inch laptop footprint.

laptops.name: Acer Aspire 5
laptops.description: Ergonomic Typing: Ergonomically-designed hinge lifts the keyboard for comfortable typing, improved cooling, and a better sound experience.

laptops.name: Dell Inspiron 15 3000
laptops.description: Dell Inspiron Laptop: Optimize your productivity with this 15.6-inch Dell Inspiron laptop with an FHD screen. The 11th Generation Intel Core i7 processor and DDR4 RAM provide reliable performance, while the SSD blend ample storage and rapid startup times. Equipped with the ports you need to be productive, including a HDMI, and SD card reader.

laptops.name: HP 15 FHD Business&Home Notebook
laptops.description: HP 15 FHD Business&Home Notebook, Intel Core I5-1135G7 Upto 4.2GHz, 12GB RAM, 256GB NVMe SSD, HDMI, Card Reader, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Windows 10 Pro / w Lone Star Computer Mouse Pad

laptops.name: Samsung Galaxy Book Pro 15 Business
laptops.description: Combining the latest Intel 11th Gen Core processor with Windows 11 OS and designed on the Intel® Evo platform, Samsung Galaxy Book Pro comes in under two pounds, so its the perfect mix of portability and productivity. Make everything you do look unbelievably brilliant with a 15.6 AMOLED screen thats the most advanced ever in a Galaxy Book.

laptops.name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro
laptops.description: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H Octa-core, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 8GB GDDR6, Windows 11 OS, 2560 x 1600 WQXGA 165Hz Display, In-Plane Switching (IPS) Technology

laptops.name: ASUS ROG Strix Scar 15
laptops.description: Exceptional speed, power, and performance elevate the ROG Strix SCAR 15 to the top tier of Windows 11 gaming. The AMD Ryzen™ 5000 series processors and powerful GeForce graphics saturate the cutting-edge 300 Hz / 3 ms gaming panel that takes you to the next frontier of pro esports speed.

laptops.name: Acer Nitro 5
laptops.description: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU 6 GB GDDR6, Intel Core i5 12th Gen 12500H (2.50GHz), 16GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD, 15.6" 1920 x 1080 IPS display with 144Hz Refresh Rate, 16:9 aspect ratio, 14.19" x 10.67" x 1.06" 5.51 lbs., 1 x HDMI 2.1 Port with HDCP support

laptops.name: HP Victus 15
laptops.description: Experience desktop-level performance and capabilities with an AMD Ryzen 7 5800H Mobile Processor and DDR4 memory. Enjoy all your favorite games in stunning detail with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU, featuring 4 GB of dedicated memory. Reduce frustrating lag and image ghosting with a display that combines a 144Hz refresh rate and 1080p resolution for smooth, crisp gameplay. Game or stream longer without slow-down thanks to the updated thermal design -- perfect for keeping your device cooled even when your gameplay heats up. Elevate your play on a full-sized, all-in-one gaming keyboard, complete with plenty of finger space, and a bigger touchpad for more accurate clicking. Whether you need to jump on a quick work call or coordinate with your team, do it in the clearest way possible with an HD camera, featuring Temporal Noise Reduction which eliminates unwanted background noise.

laptops.name: Dell G15 Ryzen Edition
laptops.description: 4th Gen AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 3.30GHz Processor (upto 4.2 GHz, 16MB Cache, 6-Cores, 12-Threads, ) ; NVIDIA RTX 3050 4GB GDDR6 Dedicated Graphics. 64GB DDR4 SODIMM ; Wi-Fi 6 AX1650 Wifi, Bluetooth 5.2, Ethernet LAN (RJ-45), 720p HD Webcam, Backlit.

laptops.name: Samsung Galaxy Book Odyssey
laptops.description: A laptop PC that's packed with power for work or play. Crush all your productivity goals like never before, whether it's a work-related project or your personal to-do list. And when it's time to kick back, you can stream or game to your heart's content with stunning visuals and stellar audio, all powered by a long-lasting battery.

laptops.name: ASUS TUF A17 (2022)
laptops.description: Jump right into the action with the TUF Gaming A17. Stream and multitask with ease thanks to an AMD Ryzen 7 6800H Mobile Processor and 16 GB of blisteringly fast 4800 MHz DDR5 RAM on Windows 11 Home. Leverage the full gaming performance of the GeForce RTX 3060 GPU with a dedicated MUX Switch. When your game library gets full, an empty M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen 4x4 SSD slot makes upgrading storage capacity a breeze.

laptops.name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus Duo 16
laptops.description: ScreenPad Plus: 14 inch 4K (3840x1100) secondary touchscreen display - Game, Stream, Create, and more! NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti 16GB GDDR6 - ROG Boost up to 1445MHz at 165W in Manual mode or 150W in Turbo mode (140W + 10W/25W with Dynamic Boost) ROG Nebula HDR Display - It guarantees minimum brightness, color representation, refresh rates, response times, and more. Enjoy flicker-free, anti-blue light displays that cut down on screen tearing with Variable Refresh Rate technology.

laptops.name: Acer Predator Helios 300
laptops.description: The Helios 300 drops you right into the game with everything you need to obliterate the opposition. Only now, we’ve armed it with the new NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti laptop graphics, the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and our custom-engineered 5th Gen AeroBlade 3D Fan Technology. With the 144Hz IPS panel, you can say farewell to blur and hello clear, crisp, high-octane gameplay.

laptops.name: Acer Predator Triton 300 SE
laptops.description: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti Laptop GPU 8 GB GDDR6, Intel Core i7 12th Gen 12700H (2.30GHz), 16GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD, 16.0" 2560 x 1600 IPS Display with NVIDIA G-SYNC technology, 240Hz Refresh Rate, 16:10 Aspect Ratio, 500nit Brightness, DCI-P3 100%

laptops.name: Acer ConceptD 3 Pro
laptops.description: Liberate yourself from the office and take your creativity on the go. With an extended battery life to last you throughout the day, the ConceptD 3 Pro's powerful NVIDIA Quadro T10001 graphics card and its 9th Gen Intel Core i5 Processor is ready to handle all of your 2D or 3D design work on a beautiful, up to 15.6" FHD PANTONE Validated display. When you create, create in style. The premium and stylish aluminum alloy chassis keeps the weight of this highly portable laptop down to a svelte 1.41kg.

laptops.name: Lenovo ThinkBook 15 Gen 4
laptops.description: Experience powerful computing while on-the-go with the 15.6" ThinkBook 15 Gen 4. Designed with a 1.7 GHz Intel Core-i7 10-core CPU and DDR4 RAM, this laptop is designed for professional business use and daily computing. Store important business documents on the M.2 SSD. Experience smooth on-screen visuals thanks to the integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics paired with the 15.6" Full HD IPS display.

laptops.name: HP Pavilion 15
laptops.description: AMD Ryzen 7 5700U, 8-Core, 1.8 GHz base frequency, up to 4.3 GHz Max Boost Frequency with integrated AMD Radeon Graphics. 15.6-inch diagonal Full HD 1080p IPS Micro-edge BrightView display. Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (2x2) and Bluetooth 5 combo, HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera, B&O Audio
